item.title: Report I-2025020067
item.description:
Report I-2025020067

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-05T00:52:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-10
  • City: BALTIMORE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY CARRIERS INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During unloading operation facility personnel failed to verify all valves and closures on storage tank were closed and secured before unloading operation began. As unloading started, product was released from a closure which was not closed on the storage tank. Operations halted and closure sealed on storage tank. Unloading completed without additional ihcident. Facility personnel cleaned released material.

item.title: Report I-2025020070
item.description:
Report I-2025020070

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-01T21:20:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-18
  • City: Hanover
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 02/18/2025 this shipment had hidden dangerous goods that were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the at the DHL BWI service center 1328 Charwood Rd, Hanover, MD,21076\ C Transportation by road confirmed. Shipment also contains/ 1T UN3481, Lithium ion batteries contained in equipment, Class 9 Single Package or Inner Packaging (if any): Packaging Type: Case Material of Construction: Plastic Package Capacity: 100 g Amount in Package: 100 g Number in Shipment 2 Number Failed: 2
